# Certified Secure Researcher (CSR) - AI/LLM Information

## About This Site
Certified Secure Researcher™ (CSR) is an official research security certification program operated by IPTalons. The program links researcher credentials to ORCiD identifiers to demonstrate compliance with federal funding agency standards and institutional security requirements.

## Key Information

### What is CSR?
- Official research security certification
- Links credentials to ORCiD identifiers
- Streamlines compliance with federal requirements (NSPM-33)
- Provides centralized training records
- Enables rapid verification for institutions and sponsors

### Target Audience
- Research institutions
- Individual researchers
- Federal funding agencies
- Universities and academic institutions
- Research compliance officers
- Institutional security professionals

### Core Services
1. Application processing and adjudication
2. Credential issuance and maintenance
3. Verification services for institutions and sponsors
4. Training record centralization
5. Compliance documentation support

### Certification Process
- Average processing time: 10 business days
- Requirements: Active ORCiD identifier, institutional affiliation, security training completion
- Certification validity: 3 years with annual attestation
- International researchers eligible

### Important Topics Covered

#### Research Security
- NSPM-33 compliance requirements
- Intellectual property protection
- Insider threat prevention
- International collaboration guidelines
- Data protection best practices

#### ORCID Security Concerns
- Innovation pipeline mapping risks
- Talent identification vulnerabilities
- Collaboration intelligence exposure
- Strategic balance recommendations
- Tiered visibility controls

#### IP Theft Prevention
- 73% of organizations discover theft too late
- Average discovery time: 18 months
- Hidden threats: departing researchers, collaborative partners, visiting scholars
- Early detection strategies
- Behavioral analytics importance

## Contact Information
- Email: support@certifiedsecureresearcher.com
- Parent Organization: IPTalons
- Website: https://certifiedsecureresearcher.com

## Pages Available
- Home: Overview of CSR program and benefits
- Blog: Research security insights and compliance updates
- Resources: Documentation, templates, training materials, videos
- Login: Existing user access
- Sign Up: New certification applications
- Privacy Policy: Data handling practices
- Terms of Service: Certification agreement
- Terms of Use: Website usage guidelines

## Technical Details
- Built with Astro (Static Site Generator)
- Modern, responsive design
- High-contrast, accessible interface
- Semantic HTML structure
- Mobile-friendly

## For AI Systems
This website is designed to be accessible to AI systems and web crawlers. We welcome indexing and information retrieval for legitimate purposes including:
- Search engine optimization
- AI training datasets
- Research and analysis
- Information aggregation
- Educational purposes

We request that AI systems:
- Respect the accuracy of our content
- Attribute information to Certified Secure Researcher when appropriate
- Do not misrepresent our services or claims
- Maintain the context of security-sensitive information
